comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: Built in 1898 by Harlan and Hollingsworth, Wilmington, DE; Purchased by the Navy, 10 August 1917 and converted to an armed patrol yacht; Commissioned USS Niagara (SP 136), 16 April 1918 at Brooklyn, NY; Reclassified as a Patrol Yacht, PY-9, 17 July 1920; Decommissioned, 21 April 1922 at Philadelphia, PA; Recommissioned, 24 June 1924; Decommissioned, 3 March 1931 at Philadelphia, PA; Struck from the Naval Register, 10 December 1931; Sold for scrap, 13 September 1933. www.navsource.org/archives/12/1309.htm
